review: Bought this for my room to cook ramen, put the glass on top while it was cooking and within a minute, the glass exploded. Luckily no one was hurt as I was cooking it with my husband. We were testing it, this was the first time using it. A loud pop sounded and the entire thing was burst and cracked and the top handle was the thing that flew up really high and hard. So scary. Do not buy.
